description: The cluster quality of service - hosts dashboard contains reports that shows the time and total time each host have performed above/below the CPU or the memory threshold, using a single stats and a table.

links.title: Administration Portal: Hosts
links.tooltip: The portal does not display deleted hosts

panels.content: ###### This dashboard contains reports that shows the time and total time each host have performed above/below the CPU or memory threshold.

panels.description: This report displays the time hosts have performed above CPU threshold.

targets.rawSql:
-- SL04-1 - Pie Charts
-- Hosts performance above thresholds

-- Time above cpu threshold
SELECT  
    CASE 
        -- Show data only when the selected period is up to 24 hours back
        WHEN $__timeFrom() >= (NOW() - INTERVAL '1443 MINUTES')
            THEN
                (
                    SELECT
                        COALESCE ( AVG ( cpu_above ), 0 ) AS cpu_above
                    FROM 
                        (
                            SELECT
                                SUM 
                                    (
                                        CASE
                                            WHEN cpu_usage_percent >= '$cpu_threshold'
                                                THEN minutes_in_status
                                            ELSE 0
                                        END
                                    ) AS cpu_above
                            FROM 
                                (
                                    SELECT DISTINCT
                                        v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id,
                                        history_datetime,
                                        cpu_usage_percent,
                                        minutes_in_status
                                    FROM
                                        (
                                            SELECT history_datetime, host_id, cpu_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status 
                                            FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples
                                        ) AS stats_hosts
                                        INNER JOIN v4_5_configuration_history_hosts
                                            ON 
                                                (
                                                    v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id =
                                                    stats_hosts.host_id
                                                )
                                    WHERE
                                        -- Here we filter only host in active status
                                        stats_hosts.host_status = 1
                                        -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the users
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id 
                                            IN 
                                                (
                                                    SELECT cluster_id
                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_clusters
                                                    WHERE datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
                                                )
                                        -- Here we filter by the host/s chosen by the user
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id IN ($host_id)
                                        -- Here we get the latest host configurations
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.history_id 
                                            IN 
                                                (
                                                    SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_hosts a
                                                    GROUP BY a.host_id
                                                )
                                        AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
                                        AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
                                        -- This will determine if deleted entities will be included in the report,
                                        -- according to the user selection for "show_deleted" parameter
                                        AND
                                            CASE
                                                WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
                                                    THEN 1=1
                                                WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
                                                    THEN delete_date isnull
                                            END
                                ) AS sub_query
                            GROUP BY host_id
                        ) AS samples_sub_queries
                )
        -- Show data only when the selected period is more then 24 hours back
        WHEN $__timeFrom() < (NOW() - INTERVAL '1443 MINUTES')
            THEN
                (
                    SELECT
                        COALESCE ( AVG ( cpu_above ), 0 ) AS cpu_above 
                    FROM 
                        (
                            SELECT
                                SUM 
                                    (
                                        CASE
                                            WHEN cpu_usage_percent >= '$cpu_threshold'
                                                THEN minutes_in_status
                                            ELSE 0
                                        END
                                    ) AS cpu_above
                            FROM 
                                (
                                    SELECT DISTINCT
                                        v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id,
                                        history_datetime,
                                        cpu_usage_percent,
                                        minutes_in_status
                                    FROM
                                        (
                                                SELECT history_datetime, host_id, cpu_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status 
                                                FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_hourly
                                            UNION
                                                SELECT history_datetime, host_id, cpu_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status
                                                FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_daily
                                                WHERE
                                                    history_datetime <
                                                        (
                                                            SELECT MIN ( history_datetime )
                                                            FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_hourly
                                                        )
                                        ) AS stats_hosts
                                        INNER JOIN v4_5_configuration_history_hosts
                                            ON 
                                                (
                                                    v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id =
                                                    stats_hosts.host_id
                                                )
                                    WHERE
                                        -- Here we filter only host in active status
                                        stats_hosts.host_status = 1
                                        -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the users
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id 
                                            IN 
                                                (
                                                    SELECT cluster_id
                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_clusters
                                                    WHERE datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
                                                )
                                        -- Here we filter by the host/s chosen by the user
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id IN ($host_id)
                                        -- Here we get the latest host configurations
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.history_id 
                                            IN 
                                                (
                                                    SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_hosts a
                                                    GROUP BY a.host_id
                                                )
                                        AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
                                        AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
                                        -- This will determine if deleted entities will be included in the report,
                                        -- according to the user selection for "show_deleted" parameter
                                        AND
                                            CASE
                                                WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
                                                    THEN 1=1
                                                WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
                                                    THEN delete_date isnull
                                            END
                                ) AS sub_query
                            GROUP BY host_id
                        ) AS hourly_daily_sub_queries
                )
    END

panels.title: Time Above CPU Threshold (SL04-1)

panels.description: This report displays the time hosts have performed above memory threshold.

targets.rawSql:
-- SL04-2 - Pie Charts
-- Hosts performance above thresholds

-- Time above memory threshold
SELECT  
    CASE 
        -- Show data only when the selected period is up to 24 hours back
        WHEN $__timeFrom() >= (NOW() - INTERVAL '1443 MINUTES')
            THEN
                (
                    SELECT
                        COALESCE ( AVG ( mem_above ), 0 ) AS mem_above
                    FROM 
                        (
                            SELECT
                                SUM 
                                    (
                                        CASE
                                            WHEN memory_usage_percent >= '$mem_threshold'
                                                THEN minutes_in_status
                                            ELSE 0
                                        END
                                    ) AS mem_above
                            FROM 
                                (
                                    SELECT DISTINCT
                                        v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id,
                                        history_datetime,
                                        memory_usage_percent,
                                        minutes_in_status
                                    FROM
                                        (
                                            SELECT history_datetime, host_id, memory_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status 
                                            FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples
                                        ) AS stats_hosts
                                        INNER JOIN v4_5_configuration_history_hosts
                                            ON 
                                                (
                                                    v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id =
                                                    stats_hosts.host_id
                                                )
                                    WHERE
                                        -- Here we filter only host in active status
                                        stats_hosts.host_status = 1
                                        -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the users
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id 
                                            IN 
                                                (
                                                    SELECT cluster_id
                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_clusters

                                        -- Here we filter by the host/s chosen by the user

                                        -- Here we get the latest host configurations

                                                    THEN 1=1
                                                WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
                                                    THEN delete_date isnull
                                            END
                                ) AS sub_query

                )
        -- Show data only when the selected period is more then 24 hours back
        WHEN $__timeFrom() < (NOW() - INTERVAL '1443 MINUTES')
            THEN
                (
                    SELECT
                        COALESCE ( AVG ( mem_above ), 0 ) AS mem_above 
                    FROM 
                        (
                            SELECT
                                SUM 
                                    (
                                        CASE
                                            WHEN memory_usage_percent >= '$mem_threshold'
                                                THEN minutes_in_status
                                            ELSE 0
                                        END
                                    ) AS mem_above
                            FROM 
                                (
                                    SELECT DISTINCT
                                        v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id,
                                        history_datetime,
                                        memory_usage_percent,
                                        minutes_in_status
                                    FROM
                                        (
                                                SELECT history_datetime, host_id, memory_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status 
                                                FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_hourly
                                            UNION
                                                SELECT history_datetime, host_id, memory_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status
                                                FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_daily
                                                WHERE
                                                    history_datetime <
                                                        (
                                                            SELECT MIN ( history_datetime )
                                                            FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_hourly
                                                        )
                                        ) AS stats_hosts
                                        INNER JOIN v4_5_configuration_history_hosts
                                            ON 
                                                (
                                                    v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id =
                                                    stats_hosts.host_id
                                                )
                                    WHERE
                                        -- Here we filter only host in active status
                                        stats_hosts.host_status = 1
                                        -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the users
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id 
                                            IN 
                                                (
                                                    SELECT cluster_id
                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_clusters
                                                    WHERE datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
                                                )
                                        -- Here we filter by the host/s chosen by the user
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id IN ($host_id)
                                        -- Here we get the latest host configurations
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.history_id 
                                            IN 
                                                (
                                                    SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_hosts a
                                                    GROUP BY a.host_id

                                        AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
                                        AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
                                        -- This will determine if deleted entities will be included in the report,
                                        -- according to the user selection for "show_deleted" parameter

                                            CASE
                                                WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
                                                    THEN 1=1

panels.title: Time Above Memory Threshold (SL04-2)

panels.description: This report displays the time hosts have performed below CPU threshold.

targets.rawSql:
-- SL04-3 - Pie Charts
-- Hosts performance below thresholds

-- Time below cpu threshold
SELECT  
    CASE 
        -- Show data only when the selected period is up to 24 hours back
        WHEN $__timeFrom() >= (NOW() - INTERVAL '1443 MINUTES')
            THEN
                (
                    SELECT
                        COALESCE ( AVG ( cpu_below ), 0 ) AS cpu_below
                    FROM 
                        (
                            SELECT
                                SUM 
                                    (
                                        CASE
                                            WHEN cpu_usage_percent < '$cpu_threshold'
                                                THEN minutes_in_status
                                            ELSE 0
                                        END
                                    ) AS cpu_below
                            FROM 
                                (
                                    SELECT DISTINCT
                                        v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id,
                                        history_datetime,
                                        cpu_usage_percent,
                                        minutes_in_status
                                    FROM
                                        (
                                            SELECT history_datetime, host_id, cpu_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status 
                                            FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples
                                        ) AS stats_hosts
                                        INNER JOIN v4_5_configuration_history_hosts
                                            ON 
                                                (
                                                    v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id =

                                    WHERE

                                        -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the users

                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_clusters

                                        -- Here we filter by the host/s chosen by the user

                                        -- Here we get the latest host configurations
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.history_id 
                                            IN

                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_hosts a

                                        AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
                                        AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
                                        -- This will determine if deleted entities will be included in the report,
                                        -- according to the user selection for "show_deleted" parameter
                                        AND
                                            CASE
                                                WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
                                                    THEN 1=1
                                                WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
                                                    THEN delete_date isnull
                                            END
                                ) AS sub_query
                            GROUP BY host_id
                        ) AS samples_sub_queries
                )
        -- Show data only when the selected period is more then 24 hours back
        WHEN $__timeFrom() < (NOW() - INTERVAL '1443 MINUTES')
            THEN
                (
                    SELECT
                        COALESCE ( AVG ( cpu_below ), 0 ) AS cpu_below 
                    FROM 
                        (
                            SELECT
                                SUM 
                                    (
                                        CASE
                                            WHEN cpu_usage_percent < '$cpu_threshold'
                                                THEN minutes_in_status
                                            ELSE 0
                                        END
                                    ) AS cpu_below
                            FROM 
                                (
                                    SELECT DISTINCT
                                        v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id,
                                        history_datetime,
                                        cpu_usage_percent,
                                        minutes_in_status
                                    FROM
                                        (
                                                SELECT history_datetime, host_id, cpu_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status 
                                                FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_hourly
                                            UNION
                                                SELECT history_datetime, host_id, cpu_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status
                                                FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_daily
                                                WHERE
                                                    history_datetime <
                                                        (
                                                            SELECT MIN ( history_datetime )
                                                            FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_hourly
                                                        )
                                        ) AS stats_hosts
                                        INNER JOIN v4_5_configuration_history_hosts
                                            ON 
                                                (
                                                    v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id =
                                                    stats_hosts.host_id
                                                )
                                    WHERE
                                        -- Here we filter only host in active status
                                        stats_hosts.host_status = 1
                                        -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the users
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id 
                                            IN 
                                                (
                                                    SELECT cluster_id
                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_clusters
                                                    WHERE datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
                                                )
                                        -- Here we filter by the host/s chosen by the user
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id IN ($host_id)
                                        -- Here we get the latest host configurations
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.history_id 
                                            IN 
                                                (
                                                    SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_hosts a

                                        AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
                                        AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()

                                        -- according to the user selection for "show_deleted" parameter

panels.title: Time Below CPU Threshold (SL04-3)

panels.description: This report displays the time hosts have performed below memory threshold.

targets.rawSql:
-- SL04-4 - Pie Charts
-- Hosts performance below thresholds

-- Time below memory threshold
SELECT  
    CASE 
        -- Show data only when the selected period is up to 24 hours back
        WHEN $__timeFrom() >= (NOW() - INTERVAL '1443 MINUTES')
            THEN
                (
                    SELECT
                        COALESCE ( AVG ( mem_below ), 0 ) AS mem_below
                    FROM 
                        (
                            SELECT
                                SUM 
                                    (
                                        CASE
                                            WHEN memory_usage_percent < '$mem_threshold'
                                                THEN minutes_in_status
                                            ELSE 0
                                        END
                                    ) AS mem_below
                            FROM 
                                (
                                    SELECT DISTINCT
                                        v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id,
                                        history_datetime,
                                        memory_usage_percent,
                                        minutes_in_status
                                    FROM
                                        (
                                            SELECT history_datetime, host_id, memory_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status 
                                            FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples
                                        ) AS stats_hosts
                                        INNER JOIN v4_5_configuration_history_hosts
                                            ON 
                                                (
                                                    v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id =
                                                    stats_hosts.host_id
                                                )
                                    WHERE
                                        -- Here we filter only host in active status
                                        stats_hosts.host_status = 1
                                        -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the users
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id 
                                            IN 
                                                (
                                                    SELECT cluster_id
                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_clusters
                                                    WHERE datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
                                                )
                                        -- Here we filter by the host/s chosen by the user
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id IN ($host_id)
                                        -- Here we get the latest host configurations
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.history_id 
                                            IN 
                                                (
                                                    SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_hosts a
                                                    GROUP BY a.host_id
                                                )
                                        AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
                                        AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
                                        -- This will determine if deleted entities will be included in the report,
                                        -- according to the user selection for "show_deleted" parameter
                                        AND
                                            CASE
                                                WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
                                                    THEN 1=1
                                                WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
                                                    THEN delete_date isnull
                                            END
                                ) AS sub_query
                            GROUP BY host_id
                        ) AS samples_sub_queries
                )
        -- Show data only when the selected period is more then 24 hours back
        WHEN $__timeFrom() < (NOW() - INTERVAL '1443 MINUTES')
            THEN
                (
                    SELECT
                        COALESCE ( AVG ( mem_below ), 0 ) AS mem_below 
                    FROM 
                        (
                            SELECT
                                SUM 
                                    (
                                        CASE
                                            WHEN memory_usage_percent < '$mem_threshold'
                                                THEN minutes_in_status
                                            ELSE 0
                                        END
                                    ) AS mem_below
                            FROM 
                                (
                                    SELECT DISTINCT
                                        v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id,
                                        history_datetime,
                                        memory_usage_percent,
                                        minutes_in_status
                                    FROM
                                        (
                                                SELECT history_datetime, host_id, memory_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status 
                                                FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_hourly
                                            UNION
                                                SELECT history_datetime, host_id, memory_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status
                                                FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_daily
                                                WHERE
                                                    history_datetime <
                                                        (
                                                            SELECT MIN ( history_datetime )
                                                            FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_hourly
                                                        )
                                        ) AS stats_hosts
                                        INNER JOIN v4_5_configuration_history_hosts
                                            ON 
                                                (
                                                    v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id =
                                                    stats_hosts.host_id
                                                )
                                    WHERE
                                        -- Here we filter only host in active status
                                        stats_hosts.host_status = 1
                                        -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the users
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id 
                                            IN 
                                                (
                                                    SELECT cluster_id
                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_clusters
                                                    WHERE datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
                                                )
                                        -- Here we filter by the host/s chosen by the user
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id IN ($host_id)
                                        -- Here we get the latest host configurations
                                        AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.history_id 
                                            IN 
                                                (
                                                    SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                                                    FROM v4_5_configuration_history_hosts a
                                                    GROUP BY a.host_id
                                                )
                                        AND history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
                                        AND history_datetime < $__timeTo()
                                        -- This will determine if deleted entities will be included in the report,
                                        -- according to the user selection for "show_deleted" parameter
                                        AND
                                            CASE
                                                WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
                                                    THEN 1=1
                                                WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
                                                    THEN delete_date isnull
                                            END
                                ) AS sub_query
                            GROUP BY host_id
                        ) AS hourly_daily_sub_queries
                )
    END

panels.title: Time Below Memory Threshold (SL04-4)

panels.description: This report displays the total time each host performed above the CPU or the memory threshold.

targets.rawSql:
-- SL04-5 - This query returns for each host in the specific datacenter,
-- the  "time_above_cpu_threshold", the "time_above_mem_threshold"
-- and the "overall_host_time".
-- The user determines the threshold for CPU and Memory.

-- This query (A) displays recent data from the last hours, 
-- and for each minute, using the samples table.
SELECT *
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            is_delete,
            cluster_id,
            host_id,
            host_name,
            host_delete_only_date,
            SUM 
                (
                    CASE
                        WHEN cpu_usage_percent >= '$cpu_threshold'
                            THEN minutes_in_status
                        ELSE 0
                    END
                ) AS time_above_cpu_threshold,
            SUM 
                (
                    CASE
                        WHEN memory_usage_percent >= '$mem_threshold'
                            THEN minutes_in_status
                        ELSE 0
                    END
                ) AS time_above_mem_threshold,
            SUM ( COALESCE ( minutes_in_status, 0 ) ) AS overall_host_time
        FROM 
            (
                SELECT DISTINCT
                    v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id,
                    v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id,
                    v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_name,
                    (
                        CASE
                            WHEN v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date IS NULL
                                THEN 'No'
                            WHEN v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date IS NOT NULL
                                THEN 'Yes'
                        END
                    ) AS is_delete,
                    CAST ( v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date AS date ) AS host_delete_only_date,
                    stats_hosts.history_datetime,
                    cpu_usage_percent,
                    memory_usage_percent,
                    minutes_in_status
                FROM
                    (
                        SELECT history_datetime, host_id, cpu_usage_percent, memory_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status
                        FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples
                    ) AS stats_hosts
                    INNER JOIN v4_5_configuration_history_hosts
                        ON 
                            (
                                stats_hosts.host_id =
                                v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id
                            )
                WHERE
                    -- Here we filter only host in active status
                    stats_hosts.host_status = 1
                    -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the users
                    AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id 
                        IN 
                            (
                                SELECT cluster_id
                                FROM v4_5_configuration_history_clusters
                                WHERE datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
                            )
                    -- Here we filter by the host/s chosen by the user
                    AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id IN ($host_id)
                    -- Here we get the latest host configurations
                    AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.history_id 
                        IN 
                            (
                                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                                FROM v4_5_configuration_history_hosts a
                                GROUP BY a.host_id
                            )
                    AND stats_hosts.history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
                    AND stats_hosts.history_datetime < $__timeTo()
                    -- This will determine if deleted entities will be included in the report,
                    -- according to the user selection for "show_deleted" parameter
                    AND
                        CASE
                            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
                                THEN 1=1
                            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
                                THEN delete_date isnull
                        END
            ) AS sub_query
        GROUP BY 
            cluster_id,
            host_id,
            host_name,
            is_delete,
            host_delete_only_date
    ) AS all_sub_queries
-- Show data only when the selected period is up to 24 hours back 
WHERE $__timeFrom() >= (NOW() - INTERVAL '1443 MINUTES')
ORDER BY
    cluster_id,
    (
        CASE
            WHEN time_above_mem_threshold = 0 AND time_above_cpu_threshold = 0
                THEN 1 -- Memory and cpu are below the threshold
            ELSE 0 -- Memory and / or cpu are above threshold
        END
    ) ASC,
    all_sub_queries.is_delete ASC,
    -- This will order the hosts based on the time the memory and cpu
    -- where above the threshold out of the overall host time.
    ( CAST ( all_sub_queries.time_above_cpu_threshold AS float ) / CAST ( all_sub_queries.overall_host_time AS float ) ) * 100 +
    ( CAST ( all_sub_queries.time_above_mem_threshold AS float ) / CAST ( all_sub_queries.overall_host_time AS float ) ) * 100 DESC

-- SL04-5 - This query returns for each host in the specific datacenter,
-- the  "time_above_cpu_threshold", the "time_above_mem_threshold"
-- and the "overall_host_time".
-- The user determines the threshold for CPU and Memory.

-- This query (B) displays historical and recent data 
-- excluding the last few hours, by using the hourly and daily tables.
SELECT *
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            is_delete,
            cluster_id,
            host_id,
            host_name,
            host_delete_only_date,
            SUM 
                (
                    CASE
                        WHEN cpu_usage_percent >= '$cpu_threshold'
                            THEN minutes_in_status
                        ELSE 0
                    END
                ) AS time_above_cpu_threshold,
            SUM 
                (
                    CASE
                        WHEN memory_usage_percent >= '$mem_threshold'
                            THEN minutes_in_status
                        ELSE 0
                    END
                ) AS time_above_mem_threshold,
            SUM ( COALESCE ( minutes_in_status, 0 ) ) AS overall_host_time
        FROM 
            (
                SELECT DISTINCT
                    v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id,
                    v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id,
                    v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_name,
                    (
                        CASE
                            WHEN v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date IS NULL
                                THEN 'No'
                            WHEN v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date IS NOT NULL
                                THEN 'Yes'
                        END
                    ) AS is_delete,
                    CAST ( v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.delete_date AS date ) AS host_delete_only_date,
                    stats_hosts.history_datetime,
                    cpu_usage_percent,
                    memory_usage_percent,
                    minutes_in_status
                FROM
                    (
                            SELECT history_datetime, host_id, cpu_usage_percent, memory_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status
                            FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_hourly
                        UNION
                            SELECT history_datetime, host_id, cpu_usage_percent, memory_usage_percent, minutes_in_status, host_status 
                            FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_daily
                            WHERE
                                history_datetime <
                                    (
                                        SELECT MIN ( history_datetime )
                                        FROM v4_5_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_hourly
                                    )
                    ) AS stats_hosts
                    INNER JOIN v4_5_configuration_history_hosts
                        ON 
                            (
                                stats_hosts.host_id =
                                v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id
                            )
                WHERE
                    -- Here we filter only host in active status
                    stats_hosts.host_status = 1
                    -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the users
                    AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.cluster_id 
                        IN 
                            (
                                SELECT cluster_id
                                FROM v4_5_configuration_history_clusters
                                WHERE datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
                            )
                    -- Here we filter by the host/s chosen by the user
                    AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.host_id IN ($host_id)
                    -- Here we get the latest host configurations
                    AND v4_5_configuration_history_hosts.history_id 
                        IN 
                            (
                                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                                FROM v4_5_configuration_history_hosts a
                                GROUP BY a.host_id
                            )
                    AND stats_hosts.history_datetime >= $__timeFrom()
                    AND stats_hosts.history_datetime < $__timeTo()
                    -- This will determine if deleted entities will be included in the report,
                    -- according to the user selection for "show_deleted" parameter
                    AND
                        CASE
                            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes'
                                THEN 1=1
                            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No'
                                THEN delete_date isnull
                        END
            ) AS sub_query
        GROUP BY 
            cluster_id,
            host_id,
            host_name,
            is_delete,
            host_delete_only_date
    ) AS all_sub_queries
-- Show data only when the selected period is more then 24 hours back
WHERE $__timeFrom() < (NOW() - INTERVAL '1443 MINUTES')
ORDER BY
    cluster_id,
    (
        CASE
            WHEN time_above_mem_threshold = 0 AND time_above_cpu_threshold = 0
                THEN 1 -- Memory and cpu are below the threshold
            ELSE 0 -- Memory and / or cpu are above threshold
        END
    ) ASC,
    all_sub_queries.is_delete ASC,
    -- This will order the hosts based on the time the memory and cpu
    -- where above the threshold out of the overall host time.
    ( CAST ( all_sub_queries.time_above_cpu_threshold AS float ) / CAST ( all_sub_queries.overall_host_time AS float ) ) * 100 +
    ( CAST ( all_sub_queries.time_above_mem_threshold AS float ) / CAST ( all_sub_queries.overall_host_time AS float ) ) * 100 DESC

panels.title: Cluster Quality of Service - Hosts (SL04-5)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT   
    CAST ( datacenter_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  
    CASE          
        WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     	    
            THEN datacenter_name 	 	
        WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      	    
            THEN datacenter_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  
    END AS __text  		
FROM v4_5_configuration_history_datacenters  		
WHERE       		    
    history_id           			    
        IN               				
            (  	             					
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					
                FROM v4_5_configuration_history_datacenters a  		         					
                GROUP BY a.datacenter_id 	         				
            ) 	 			
    AND datacenter_id  	         			    
        IN 			     				    
            ( 					 						
                SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id 					 						
                FROM v4_5_configuration_history_clusters 					 						
                WHERE  					     						    
                    cluster_id 					         						        
                        IN 					             						            
                            ( 									 										
                                SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 									 										
                                FROM v4_5_configuration_history_hosts  								 									
                            ) 				 					
            ) 	 			
    AND 	    			    
        CASE  	        				    
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            					    
                THEN 1=1 		    					
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        					    
                THEN v4_5_configuration_history_datacenters.delete_date ISNULL 	                
        END
list.label: Data Center
list.name: datacenter_id
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT   
    CAST ( datacenter_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  
    CASE          
        WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     	    
            THEN datacenter_name 	 	
        WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      	    
            THEN datacenter_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  
    END AS __text  		
FROM v4_5_configuration_history_datacenters  		
WHERE       		    
    history_id           			    
        IN               				
            (  	             					
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					
                FROM v4_5_configuration_history_datacenters a  		         					
                GROUP BY a.datacenter_id 	         				
            ) 	 			
    AND datacenter_id  	         			    
        IN 			     				    
            ( 					 						
                SELECT DISTINCT datacenter_id 					 						
                FROM v4_5_configuration_history_clusters 					 						
                WHERE  					     						    
                    cluster_id 					         						        
                        IN 					             						            
                            ( 									 										
                                SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 									 										
                                FROM v4_5_configuration_history_hosts  								 									
                            ) 				 					
            ) 	 			
    AND 	    			    
        CASE  	        				    
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            					    
                THEN 1=1 		    					
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        					    
                THEN v4_5_configuration_history_datacenters.delete_date ISNULL 	                
        END

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT        
    CAST ( cluster_id AS varchar ) AS __value,  	
    CASE      	    
        WHEN delete_date IS NULL  	     		    
            THEN cluster_name 	 		
        WHEN delete_date IS NOT null  	      		    
            THEN cluster_name || ' (Removed on ' || CAST ( CAST ( delete_date AS date ) AS varchar ) || ')'  	
    END AS __text  	
FROM v4_5_configuration_history_clusters  	
WHERE       	    
    history_id           		    
        IN               			    
            (  	             					
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )  		         					
                FROM v4_5_configuration_history_clusters a  		         					
                GROUP BY a.cluster_id 	         				
            ) 	 		
    AND cluster_id  	         		    
        IN 			     			    
            ( 					 					
                SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id 					 					
                FROM v4_5_configuration_history_hosts 				 				
            ) 	 		
    AND 	    		    
        CASE  	        			    
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='Yes' 	            				    
                THEN 1=1 		    				
            WHEN '$show_deleted'='No' 		        				    
                THEN v4_5_configuration_history_clusters.delete_date ISNULL 	    			
        END     		
    AND datacenter_id IN ($datacenter_id)
